title: Nepal Idol
resume: Nepal Idol is here with its first season in Nepal with three exceptional prodigies as our judges. The judges are Kali Prasad Baskota, Nhyoo Bajracharya and Indira Joshi. Nepal Idol will be airing exclusively only on AP1 channel after the successful audition of the contestants. The excitement has begun, are you ready to embark upon the quest of finding the first ever Nepal Idol?
